headline: Battlefield 6’s Game-Changing Multiplayer and More Revealed During Blockbuster Global Event
summary: LOS ANGELES, July 31, 2025--Today, during a live global multiplayer reveal event, Electronic Arts (NASDAQ: EA) and Battlefield Studios unveiled Battlefield 6™, the ultimate all-out warfare experience. Launching on October 10, Battlefield 6 is available on PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam™, EA App, Epic Games Store).
